channel.title: Research Fellows on Chao ZHOU
channel.description: Recent content in Research Fellows on Chao ZHOU

item.title: Guanxing FU
item.description: Bio Currently I am a Research Fellow in National University of Singapore. Here I am working on mean field games, stochastic control and mathematical finance. I obtained my PhD degree from Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin in 2018. My PhD thesis focuses on mean field games arising in optimal portfolio liquidation, mean field games with singular controls as well as BSPDEs. My Info Work Email: matfg@nus.edu.sg Personal Email: fuguanxing725@gmail.com CV
